nodes.text: Atlantis was a place on Indiana Jones's homeworld that Doctor Indiana Jones visited sometime prior to his discovery of the remains of the Millennium Falcon. It was implied to be quite advanced yet mysterious, as Dr. Jones himself admitted when encountering the Millennium Falcon that the ship's appearance and design exceeded that of the locale.
Atlantis was the name of a legendary city that had existed during the Hellenistic period that sunk below the waves.
Indy's reference to visiting Atlantis is presumably a reference to the LucasArts game, Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis.
